articles.description: Follow match build-up, live text updates and radio from the Premier League featuring Bournemouth v Newcastle United.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Build-up to Bournemouth vs Newcastle United (14:00 kick off) & two other games

articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris fights back to take a dominant victory in the Dutch Grand Prix despite losing the lead to Max Verstappen’s Red Bull at the start.
articles.title: Lando Norris wins Dutch Grand Prix 2024

articles.description: Arne Slot's first Premier League home game in charge of Liverpool ends in victory as the Reds continue their winning start to the season against Brentford.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-0 Brentford: Arne Slot's first Anfield league game ends in victory

articles.description: Noni Madueke's hat-trick gives Chelsea their first Premier League victory of the season as they beat Wolves in a pulsating and chaotic encounter.
articles.title: Wolves 2-6 Chelsea: Noni Madueke's hat-trick gives Enzo Maresca first Premier League win

articles.description: Real Madrid secure their first La Liga victory of the season with a hard-fought home win against Real Valladolid.
articles.title: Real Madrid 3-0 Real Valladolid: Valverde, Diaz & Endrick score for hosts

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Wolfsburg vs Bayern München in the Bundesliga
articles.title: Wolfsburg vs Bayern München: Bundesliga - BBC Sport

articles.description: Jakob Ingebrigtsen smashes the 3,000m world record before Armand Duplantis breaks his own pole vault world record at the Diamond League event in Silesia.
articles.title: Diamond League: Jakob Ingebrigtsen and Armand Duplantis set world records in Silesia

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra commentary from the final round of the Women's Open at St Andrews.
articles.title: Women's Open LIVE: Text and radio commentary from the final round

articles.description: Dango Ouattara has a late winner ruled out in a dramatic finale as Anthony Gordon's strike earns Newcastle a point at Bournemouth.
articles.title: Bournemouth 1-1 Newcastle United: Anthony Gordon earns Magpies draw as Dango Ouattara has late goal disallowed for Cherries

articles.description: British number one Jack Draper says he endured a "difficult" time after having his integrity questioned following a controversial win.
articles.title: US Open: Britain's Jack Draper on 'difficult' time after shot controversy and coach split
